txt.en: Upon the ruins of Shakal-atrâd, in Elderslade, an Angmarim ritual has taken place, defiling the old watch-tower….\n\nYour mission is to destroy the Angmarim ritual at Shakal-atrâd.
You have been tasked with destroying the Angmarim ritual at Shakal-atrâd.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have returned from Shakal-atrâd. The Angmarim have performed some ritual at the old dwarf watch-post. This can not stand! We must return to Shakal-atrâd and put a stop to their fell practices!'
At low health, monsters in this mission will attempt to end their own life to damage and apply a fear effect to those nearby.
Your mission is to destroy the Angmarim ritual at Shakal-atrâd.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Shakal-atrâd.
'Well done! With the Angmarim ritual disrupted, the tower may once again be a watch-post for the dwarves! If we are to keep the road to Gundabad clear, Shakal-atrâd must remain under our protection.'
